channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 根据 CoinShares 的数据，全球加密货币基金上周急剧下滑，投资者撤资 9.42 亿美元，创下历史之最。
item.description:
Global crypto funds took a sharp downturn last week as investors pulled out $942 million — the most on record, according to CoinShares. https://t.co/LcLABYvfhE

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 上周末，在美国大学生体育协会（NCAA）举办的 "疯狂三月 "锦标赛中，普渡大学野人队击败了格兰布林州立大学和犹他州大学，球迷们沉浸在胜利的喜悦中。
item.description:
Fans of the Purdue University Boilermakers are reveling in victory after the top-ranked college basketball team trounced Grambling State and Utah State in the NCAA’s March Madness Tournament over the weekend. https://t.co/tCShb67pAn

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 英国制裁了被指控参与中国间谍活动的两个人和一家公司。但是，将中英两国经济脱钩比想象中要难得多。与 @AllegraStratton 一起获取读数
item.description:
The UK has sanctioned two people and a company who were accused of involvement in Chinese spying. But unlinking the two economies is harder than it looks. Get The Readout with @AllegraStratton https://t.co/mt4jO6JFDa

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 加拿大私人飞机制造商庞巴迪公司周五出售了7.5亿美元的垃圾债券，用于为2026年到期的债务再融资
item.description:
Canadian private-jet maker Bombardier sold a $750 million junk bond Friday to help refinance debt due in 2026 https://t.co/Hl1A4eKlyu

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）提升了底特律的评级，一度破产的底特律首次获得了投资级评级，标志着该市迈出了重要一步
item.description:
Once-bankrupt Detroit has won its first investment-grade rating after an upgrade by Moody’s Ratings, marking a major step for the city https://t.co/Qdz6UMkOfG

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 收购公司 Advent 正寻求出售法国生物识别公司 Idemia 的欧洲身份验证业务，作为分拆计划的一部分
item.description:
Buyout firm Advent is looking to sell the European identity authentication business of French biometrics firm Idemia as part of a breakup plan https://t.co/Odf06es5jf

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 破产的加密货币交易所 FTX 的遗产正在通过一系列价值 8.84 亿美元的出售，卸下其在人工智能初创公司 Anthropic 的大部分股份。
item.description:
The estate of bankrupt crypto exchange FTX is offloading the majority of its stake in artificial intelligence startup Anthropic in a series of sales worth $884 million https://t.co/EBu88Ky8Vj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 周一，至少有六家美国公司开始进入高收益债券市场，因为投资者对国债的额外收益率要求徘徊在两年低点
item.description:
At least six US companies are tapping the high-yield bond market Monday as the extra yield investors demand over Treasuries hovers at a two-year low https://t.co/renl6M4VYk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体初创公司特朗普媒体与科技集团（Trump Media & Technology Group）将于周二在纳斯达克开始交易，股票代码为 DJT
item.description:
Donald Trump’s social media startup, Trump Media & Technology Group, is set to begin trading Tuesday on the Nasdaq under the symbol DJT https://t.co/uk0Q4TmvEW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 交易员押注英格兰银行将先于欧美同行开始降息
item.description:
Traders are betting the Bank of England will start cutting interest rates before its European and US peers https://t.co/VvQJ5IUISK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 由于比特币爱好者似乎正在摆脱上周美国交易所交易基金资金外流的影响，比特币再次短暂攀升至 7 万美元以上。
item.description:
Bitcoin briefly climbed back above $70,000 again as enthusiasts appear to be shrugging off last week’s outflows from US exchange-traded funds. https://t.co/7jQQ2SHk1H

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 由于可可作物的危机，加纳没有足够的可可豆来获得资金，因此加纳将失去获得关键融资机制的机会。
item.description:
Ghana is set to lose access to a key funding facility as a crisis in its cocoa crop has left it without enough beans to secure the funds. https://t.co/cFqKJVGG7f

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 英国制裁了与中国国家下属网络组织有关联的两个人和一家公司，称其应对针对民主机构和英国立法者的恶意网络活动负责。
item.description:
The UK has sanctioned two people and one company linked to Chinese state-affiliated cyber organizations that it said was responsible for malicious cyber campaigns targeting democratic institutions and British lawmakers https://t.co/ZQDvYkA3t1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 美国垃圾债市场正在发出警告，因为美联储利率的长期走高有可能对财政造成压力
item.description:
The US junk-debt market is flashing a warning, as higher-for-longer Fed rates threaten to put the squeeze on finances https://t.co/ODk5USZGbt

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯农业监管机构建议削减一家顶级谷物贸易商的出口配额
item.description:
Russia’s agriculture regulator has proposed cutting the export quota of a top grain trader https://t.co/8FrxB0wKxk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰农业部长表示，几个欧盟成员国推动限制从乌克兰进口谷物的做法是出于政治动机
item.description:
A push by several EU member states to limit the import of grain from Ukraine is politically motivated, the country’s agriculture minister says https://t.co/1q6zkBsv8x

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 欧洲最大的收债公司之一 Intrum 表示，将在未来几周内启动与债权人的谈判，以设法管理其债务负担
item.description:
One of Europe’s biggest debt collectors, Intrum, says talks with creditors will kick off in the coming weeks as it seeks to manage its debt burden https://t.co/PWZeZkQpkw

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 在美国表示将审查来自拉美国家的一些货物是否违反了贸易协议规则之后，美国糖生产商正在寻求遏制从墨西哥的进口。
item.description:
American sugar producers are seeking to curb imports from Mexico after the US said it would examine whether some shipments from the Latin American nation breached trade deal rules. https://t.co/P2IwLbmsR0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 据麦格理（Macquarie）称，美国石油日产量将在年底达到创纪录的约 1400 万桶。
item.description:
US oil production is set to end the year at a record pace of about 14 million barrels a day, according to Macquarie https://t.co/uzyOocNVWq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: Francisco Partners 旗下计算机网络公司 Sandvine 及其部分贷款人聘请顾问解决即将到期的债务问题
item.description:
Francisco Partners’ computer networking company Sandvine and some of its lenders tapped advisers to address upcoming debt maturities https://t.co/pq0BoFBzAO

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 美国消费者期望在房屋销售佣金集体诉讼和解后节省大笔开支，但可能会大失所望
item.description:
US consumers expecting big savings after a class-action settlement on home-sales commissions may be in for a letdown https://t.co/B6fJauCWnS

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 在过去五年中，伦敦的房产负担能力在英格兰得到了最大改善，但与收入相比，伦敦的房产仍然昂贵得令人瞠目结舌
item.description:
Properties in London saw the biggest improvement in affordability in England over the last five years but still remain eye-wateringly expensive compared to earnings https://t.co/yB9qlFGg4l

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 今早股市从历史高位回落。加入彭博监控，了解最新的市场新闻和见解。@TomKeene @PTSweeney @LisaMateoTV @BigBarrSports 正在直播。在 YouTube 上观看：
item.description:
Stocks are coming off record highs this morning.
Join Bloomberg Surveillance for the latest market news and insight. @TomKeene @PTSweeney @LisaMateoTV @BigBarrSports are LIVE right now.
Watch on YouTube: https://t.co/otzazZnkbX

— Bloomberg Radio (@BloombergRadio) March 25, 2024

item.title: 上周末，中国和俄罗斯被提醒，在经济战争和国际航运的迷雾中，没有什么是可以保证的
item.description:
China and Russia got a reminder over the weekend that there are no guarantees in the fog of economic warfare and international shipping https://t.co/uW2KoyblAA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 有报道称中国将限制在政府计算机中使用美国制造的芯片，英特尔和 AMD 的股价在盘前交易中下跌
item.description:
Intel and AMD shares fall in premarket trading after a report that China will limit the use of US-made chips in government computers https://t.co/m9DquApYvI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 三星运输公司（Tristar Transport）重新启动了出售计划，这家中东物流公司正试图从业务激增中套现。
item.description:
Tristar Transport has revived plans for a sale as the Middle East logistics firm seek to cash in on a surge in business https://t.co/nQYlxYnJoe

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 由于摩根士丹利首次进行共同基金转换，该公司的 ETF 产品阵容目前持有超过 10 亿美元的资金
item.description:
Morgan Stanley’s ETF lineup now holds more than $1 billion thanks to the firm’s first-ever mutual-fund conversions https://t.co/L9MEu9nr6G

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 人工智能会计初创公司 FundGuard 获得 1 亿美元新融资，其中包括来自全球大型投资公司的投资
item.description:
AI accounting startup FundGuard raises $100 million in new funding, including from major global investment firms https://t.co/8JMnz8apsY

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: @David_Stringer 写道：中国小型太阳能企业缺乏行业重量级企业的多样化和规模化，很可能在整合浪潮中首当其冲。
item.description:
Small Chinese solar companies that lack the diversification and scale of the industry heavyweights are likely to bear the brunt of a wave of consolidation, writes @David_Stringer https://t.co/eBGeI1DwY5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 联合利华冰淇淋部门首席执行官表示，阿姆斯特丹可能会击败伦敦，以 170 亿欧元的价格上市
item.description:
Amsterdam may beat London to a potential €17 billion listing of Unilever's ice cream unit, according to its CEO https://t.co/vGBPRu4rxf

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024
